identified-content.person: POMERANTZ, RABBI REBECCA JENNIFER (RABBI REBECCA JENNIFER SHINDER)

block.p: Rabbi Rebecca Jennifer Pomerantz, the daughter of Rabbi Fredric S. Pomerantz and Mrs. Pomerantz of Closter, N.J., is to be married today to Lawrence Brian Shinder, a son of Mr. and Mrs. Norman Shinder of Monsey, N.Y. The bride's father, the rabbi of Temple Beth El of Northern Valley in Closter, performed the ceremony in his synagogue.

The bride, 28, is the assistant rabbi of Temple Sinai of Bergen County in Tenafly, N.J. She graduated magna cum laude from the University of Rochester and was ordained by Hebrew Union College-Jewish Institute of Religion in New York. Her mother, Sandra Pomerantz, is the president of Academic Software, a distributor of educational computer software in Teaneck, N.J. The bride's father was the president of the New Jersey Association of Reform Rabbis and a national board member of the Central Conference of American Rabbis.
